snippet.title: SNES Longplay - Side Pocket
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by xRavenXP

Side Pocket is a pocket billiards (pool) simulator game originally released into arcade by Data East and Iguana Entertainment. Versions of the arcade original were developed for various platforms and two sequels to the game were produced. A game very fun, with the world of pocket billiards, glamour, women, drinks, etc and great OST (my favorites are Natural Shot and The Lounge). This longplay is the SNES version of the game Side Pocket (released for SNES in 1993)! The G-mode Company currently owns the intellectual property rights to the Side Pocket series, and licenses these games globally. Played in 1P Pocket Game mode. All balls pocketed in a row, yeah!

Stage 1: Los Angeles: 01:01
Stage 2: Las Vegas: 02:58
Stage 3: San Francisco: 06:05
Stage 4: New York: 08:10
Final Stage: Atlantic City: 10:14 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
